title: Singkham Phongpratith
text: Singkham Phongpratith (born 10 October 1950) is a Laotian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201980%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20flyweight">men's light flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1980%20Summer%20Olympics">1980 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1980 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Pedro%20Nieves">Pedro Nieves</a> of Venezuela.
